name: @targetpackage/d3-context-menu
description: A plugin for d3.js that allows you to easily use context menus in your visualizations.

scripts.dist: mkdirp dist && uglifyjs js/d3-context-menu.js -o dist/d3-context-menu.min.js -c -m --source-map "includeSources" && minify css/d3-context-menu.css > dist/d3-context-menu.min.css

author: Patrick Gillespie
